text: haey nowpel del krohthnak ban bietbien mnoussaalok ke kaban buongsuong som pi mcheasa robsa ke daoysaar pheap kamhosa tow champoh trong . banteabmk nowpel del trong ban bratan nie k meat robsa trong aoy ke vinh noh ke ka phe l ch nouv avei delke thleab buongsuong som pi trong kalpi moun themtang ban bangkeut preah neanea samreab thveu shi ri k champoh a l laoh daembi thveu aoy( mnoussa lok) v nge v ng pi meakra robsa trong tiet phng . chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha chaur anak sabbayrikreay nung pheap kmean chomnue robsa anak muoyorypel sen choh . pitabrakd nasa anak ku sthet knongchamnaom puok nork
